mapper.select: -- retrieveSpaceEvToolSearchDtl 공간평가Tool 상세 조회 SELECT TOOL_NM as "toolNm" ,VER as "ver" ,CMPN_NM as "cmpnNm" ,SSO.SA_NAME as "mchnCrgrNm" ,MCHN_CRGR_ID as "mchnCrgrId" ,MCHN_CL_CD as "evCtgr" ,EV_WAY as "evWay" ,MCHN_EXPL as "mchnExpl" ,MCHN_SMRY as "mchnSmry" ,F.ATTC_FIL_ID as "attcFilId" ,G.ATTC_FIL_ID as "mnalFilId" ,F.SEQ as "seq" ,G.SEQ as "mnalSeq" ,MCHN_INFO_ID as "mchnInfoId" ,ORD_NO as "ordNo" FROM IRIS_SPACE_MCHN_INFO_MGMT SPCE LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER SSO ON SSO.SA_SABUN_NEW = SPCE.MCHN_CRGR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL F ON F.ATTC_FIL_ID = SPCE.ATTC_FIL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL G ON G.ATTC_FIL_ID = SPCE.MNAL_FIL_ID AND F.DEL_YN ='N' AND G.DEL_YN ='N' WHERE MCHN_INFO_ID = #{mchnInfoId};
